alert.note: Alert for Cherokee (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued February 05 at 2:17AM EST until further notice by NWS Atlanta
info.description: ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Georgia... Etowah River near East Canton Downstream I-575 affecting Cherokee County. ...FLOOD WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL FURTHER NOTICE... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring. * WHERE...Etowah River near East Canton Downstream I-575. * WHEN...Until further notice. * IMPACTS...At 20 feet, Minor flooding continues to expand in the woodlands and fields along the river generally east of Canton near the Interstate 575 bridge. A rock landing and grassy lot behind a pump station off of Riverstone Parkway and areas behind the businesses on Old Ball Ground Highway and Keith Drive are flooded with up to two feet of water. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 1:45 AM EST Saturday the stage was 20.1 feet and falling. - Recent Activity...The maximum river stage in the 24 hours ending at 1:45 AM EST Saturday was 20.9 feet. - Forecast...No forecast is available for this location. - Flood stage is 17 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Additional information is available at weather.gov/atlanta.
